revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #10 Frambu (Razz) |image = [[File:Razz.png]] |caption = Es una baya algo seca. Sus gránulos rojos le dan un sabor un pelín picante. |growtime = 4m 10s |harvest = 7 bayas |replant = 40% |mutation = 1.9% |points = 15 |flavor =
*10 picante *10 seco *0 dulce *0 amargo *0 ácido }} '''Frambu (Razz)''' es un tipo de [[Berries|baya]] que puede ser plantada en la [[Farm|granja]]. Se puede obtener rodeando una parcela vacía con al menos 1 baya [[Cheri|Zreza (Cheri)]] y al menos 1 baya [[Leppa|Zanama (Leppa)]]. == Tablas de Crecimiento == === Estados de Crecimiento === {| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" !!! Brote !! Crecimiento !! Floración !! Madurez |- ! Tiempo pasado desde que se planta | 1 min 40 seg || 2 mins 30 seg || 3 mins 20 seg || 4 mins 10 seg - 8 mins 20 seg |- ! Animación |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:RazzTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:RazzTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:RazzTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} ===Tiempos de Maduración con modificadores=== {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modificador !! Tiempo hasta la madurez-marchitado |- ! Ninguno | 4 min 10 seg -
8 min 20 seg |- ! Psydugadera | 2 min 47 seg -
5 min 53 seg |} == Diagrama de Flujo == [[File:Razz_Flow_Chart.png|200px]]
'''Leyenda:'''
· Random Drop: Obtenido aleatoriamente en ruta == Estrategia de mutación == === Posibles formaciones === Puedes llenar tu granja del siguiente modo para obtener bayas Frambu (Razz). Los cuadrados morados indican dónde pueden ocurrir las mutaciones.
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Base Formation |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Cheri.png|30px]] [[Cheri]] || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Leppa.png|30px]] [[Leppa]] |}
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Optimized Planting Formation |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Cheri.png|30px]] [[Cheri]] || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Cheri.png|30px]] [[Cheri]] || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Leppa.png|30px]] [[Leppa]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | ||style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Leppa.png|30px]] [[Leppa]] |- style="height: 50px;" | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | ||style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | [[File:Cheri.png|30px]] [[Cheri]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Cheri.png|30px]] [[Cheri]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Leppa.png|30px]] [[Leppa]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Leppa.png|30px]] [[Leppa]] |}
=== Timing Table === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" |+ ''All planting times use the time-to-ripe remaining of the first planted berry for subsequent planting times'' ! Berry !! Planting Time with
No Modifier !! Planting Time with
Mulch or Sprayduck || Planting Time with
Mulch & Sprayduck |- | [[Leppa]] || - || - || - |- | [[Cheri]] || 30 secs until ripe || 20 secs until ripe || Not Practical |- |}
==Uses== ===Mutations===
Razz berries can be used to mutate the following berries.
{| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" |- ! Used In !! With |- | [[File:Tamato.png|20px]] [[Tamato]] || [[File:Pomeg.png|20px]] [[Pomeg]] |- | [[File:Occa.png|20px]] [[Occa]] || [[File:Figy.png|20px]] [[Figy]]
[[File:Tamato.png|20px]] [[Tamato]]
[[File:Spelon.png|20px]] [[Spelon]] |- |}
===[[Safari Zone]] bait===
As a type of bait, Razz berries give Pokémon in the Safari Zone "eating" status for 2 - 6 turns, and divides escape chance by 1.5 for the rest of the encounter unless another type of bait is used.
==Acquisition== ===Dungeons=== {{Loot/head‎|Berries}} {{LootItem|Berry Forest|Epic}} {{LootItem|Radio Tower|Epic}} {{LootItem|New Mauville|Epic}} {{LootItem|Eterna Forest|Common}} {{LootItem|Wayward Cave|Common}} {{LootItem|Dragonspiral Tower|Common}} |} |}

{{Berries}}
[[Category:Farm]][[Category:Berries]]

'''Leyenda:'''
· Random Drop: Obtenido aleatoriamente en ruta == Estrategia de mutación == === Posibles formaciones ===
You can fill your farm in the following way to obtain Razz berries. Purple squares indicate where mutations can occur.
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Base Formation |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Cheri.png|30px]] [[Cheri]] || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Leppa.png|30px]] [[Leppa]] |}
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Optimized Planting Formation |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Cheri.png|30px]] [[Cheri]] || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Cheri.png|30px]] [[Cheri]] || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Leppa.png|30px]] [[Leppa]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | ||style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Leppa.png|30px]] [[Leppa]] |- style="height: 50px;" | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | ||style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | [[File:Cheri.png|30px]] [[Cheri]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Cheri.png|30px]] [[Cheri]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Leppa.png|30px]] [[Leppa]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Leppa.png|30px]] [[Leppa]] |}
=== Timing Table === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" |+ ''All planting times use the time-to-ripe remaining of the first planted berry for subsequent planting times'' ! Berry !! Planting Time with
No Modifier !! Planting Time with
Mulch or Sprayduck || Planting Time with
Mulch & Sprayduck |- | [[Leppa]] || - || - || - |- | [[Cheri]] || 30 secs until ripe || 20 secs until ripe || Not Practical |- |}
==Uses== ===Mutations===
Razz berries can be used to mutate the following berries.
{| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" |- ! Used In !! With |- | [[File:Tamato.png|20px]] [[Tamato]] || [[File:Pomeg.png|20px]] [[Pomeg]] |- | [[File:Occa.png|20px]] [[Occa]] || [[File:Figy.png|20px]] [[Figy]]
[[File:Tamato.png|20px]] [[Tamato]]
[[File:Spelon.png|20px]] [[Spelon]] |- |}
===[[Safari Zone]] bait===
As a type of bait, Razz berries give Pokémon in the Safari Zone "eating" status for 2 - 6 turns, and divides escape chance by 1.5 for the rest of the encounter unless another type of bait is used.
==Acquisition== ===Dungeons=== {{Loot/head‎|Berries}} {{LootItem|Berry Forest|Epic}} {{LootItem|Radio Tower|Epic}} {{LootItem|New Mauville|Epic}} {{LootItem|Eterna Forest|Common}} {{LootItem|Wayward Cave|Common}} {{LootItem|Dragonspiral Tower|Common}} |} |}
